lead_paragraph: Protesters trying to stymie the Dakota Access oil pipeline sneaked up on a truss connected to the roof and rappelled down to unfurl a huge banner inside U.S. Bank Stadium during the Minnesota Vikings' season finale against the Chicago Bears.
snippet: Protesters trying to stymie the Dakota Access oil pipeline sneaked up on a truss connected to the roof and rappelled down to unfurl a huge banner inside U.S. Bank Stadium during the Minnesota Vikings' season finale against the Chicago Bears....

headline.main: Oil Pipeline Protesters Unfurl Huge Banner at Vikings Game
headline.print_headline: Oil Pipeline Protesters Unfurl Huge Banner at Vikings Game
